question_text: $\text{Which of the following statements is true?}$
option_a: $\text{Every scalar matrix is an identity matrix}$
option_b: $\text{Every identity matrix is a scalar matrix}$
option_c: $\text{Every diagonal matrix is an identity matrix}$

question_text: $\text{Find the equation of the straight line passing through } (2,-1) \text{ and parallel to } 3x+2y-6=0.$
plain_text: Equation of a line parallel to a given line
